00082   void estimateChi_n(unsigned a = 10000) {
00083     chi_n = 0;
00084     for(i = 0; i < a; i++) {
00085       double sum = 0;
00086       for(j = 0; j < Dimension; j++)
00087         sum += sqr(Rng::gauss(0,1));
00088       chi_n += sqrt(sum);
00089     }
00090     chi_n /=a;
00091   }
00092 
00093   void init(unsigned _Dimension, std::vector<double > var, double _delta) {
00094     Dimension = _Dimension;
00095     c        = 1. / sqrt( double( Dimension ) );
00096     cu       = sqrt((2.-c) * c);
00097     ccov     = 2. / (sqr(double( Dimension) ) + Dimension);
00098     D        = 1 / sqrt(double( Dimension ));
00099     chi_n    = sqrt( double(Dimension) ) * (1 - 1. / (4.*Dimension) +  1. /
00100 (21.*sqr( double(Dimension))));
00101 
00102     z.resize         (Dimension);
00103     s.resize         (Dimension);
00104     sDelta.resize    (Dimension);
00105     C.resize         (Dimension, Dimension);
00106     B.resize         (Dimension, Dimension);
00107     lambda.resize    (Dimension);
00108 
00109     theMatrix.resize (Dimension, Dimension);
00110     theVector.resize (Dimension);
00111 
00112     delta = _delta;
00113     for (i = 0; i < Dimension; i++) {
00114       s(i) = sDelta(i) = 0.;
00115       for (j = 0; j < Dimension; j++) {
00116         if(i!=j) C(i,j) = 0;
00117         else C(i,j) = var[i];
00118       }
00119     }
00120 
00121     //
00122     // eigenvalues lambda and eigenvector matrix B
00123     //
00124     eigensymm(C, B, lambda);
00125   }

00127   void init(unsigned _Dimension, double _delta) {
00128     Dimension = _Dimension;
00129     c        = 1. / sqrt( double( Dimension ) );
00130     cu       = sqrt((2.-c) * c);
00131     ccov     = 2. / (sqr(double(Dimension)) + Dimension);
00132     D        = 1 / sqrt(double(Dimension));
00133     chi_n    = sqrt(double(Dimension)) * (1 - 1. / (4.*Dimension)
00134                                   +  1. / (21.*sqr(double(Dimension))));
00135 
00136     z.resize         (Dimension);
00137     s.resize         (Dimension);
00138     sDelta.resize    (Dimension);
00139     C.resize         (Dimension, Dimension);
00140     B.resize         (Dimension, Dimension);
00141     lambda.resize    (Dimension);
00142 
00143     theMatrix.resize (Dimension, Dimension);
00144     theVector.resize (Dimension);
00145 
00146     delta = _delta;
00147     for (i = 0; i < Dimension; i++) {
00148       s(i) = sDelta(i) = 0.;
00149       for (j = 0; j < Dimension; j++) {
00150         if(i!=j) C(i,j) = 0;
00151         else C(i,j) = 1;
00152       }
00153     }
00154 
00155     //
00156     // eigenvalues lambda and eigenvector matrix B
00157     //
00158     eigensymm(C, B, lambda);
00159   }

00161   //
00162   // calculate center
00163   //
00164   void center(ChromosomeT<double >& x, Population &p, unsigned c = 0) {
00165     unsigned i, j;
00166     unsigned Dimension = dynamic_cast<ChromosomeT<double >&
00167 >(p[0][c]).size();
00168     for(j = 0; j < Dimension; j++) x[j] = dynamic_cast<ChromosomeT<double >&
00169 >(p[0][c])[j] ;
00170     for(i = 1; i < p.size(); i++) {
00171       for(j = 0; j < Dimension; j++) {
00172         x[j] += dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >(p[i][c])[j];
00173       }
00174     }
00175     for(j = 0; j < Dimension; j++) x[j] /= p.size();
00176   }
00177 
00178   void mutate(ChromosomeT<double> &x, Individual &o) {
00179     unsigned i, j;
00180 
00181     // draw random vector
00182     for(i = 0; i < Dimension; i++) {
00183       z(i) = Rng::gauss(0,1);
00184       dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >(o[1])[i] = z(i);
00185     }
00186 
00187     // mutate objective variables, Eq. (1)
00188     for (i = 0; i < Dimension; i++) dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >&
00189 >(o[0])[i] = x[i];
00190 
00191     for (i = 0; i < Dimension; i++)
00192       for (j = 0; j < Dimension; j++) {
00193         dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >(o[0])[i] += delta * B(i,j) *
00194 sqrt(fabs(lambda(j))) * z(j);
00195       }
00196   }

00199     unsigned i, j;
00200 
00201     // draw random vector
00202     for(i = 0; i < Dimension; i++) {
00203       z(i) = Rng::gauss(0,1);
00204     }
00205 
00206     // mutate objective variables, Eq. (1)
00207     for (i = 0; i < Dimension; i++) dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >&
00208 >(o[0])[i] = x[i];
00209 
00210     for (i = 0; i < Dimension; i++)
00211       for (j = 0; j < Dimension; j++)
00212         dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >(o[0])[i] += delta * B(i,j) *
00213 sqrt(fabs(lambda(j))) * z(j);
00214   }

00216   void updateStrategyParameters(ChromosomeT<double> &x, Population &p,
00217                                 double lowerBound = .0) {
00218     double normS;
00219     ChromosomeT<double> xPrime(Dimension);
00220     center(xPrime, p);
00221 
00222     // Eq. (2)
00223     for (i = 0; i < Dimension; i++) {
00224       s(i) = (1 - c) * s(i) + cu * sqrt(double(p.size())) / delta *
00225 (xPrime[i] - x[i]);
00226     }
00227     // Eq. (3)
00228     for (i = 0; i < Dimension; i++)
00229       for (j = 0; j < Dimension; j++)
00230         C(i, j ) = ( 1 - ccov ) * C(i, j) + ccov * s(i) * s(j);
00231 
00232 
00233     // Eq. (4)
00234     normS     = 0;
00235     theVector = 0;
00236 
00237     Array<double> help(Dimension);
00238     help = 0;
00239     for (i = 0; i < Dimension; i++) {
00240       for (j = 0; j < p.size(); j++) {
00241         help(i) += dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >(p[j][1])[i];
00242       }
00243     }
00244 
00245     for (i = 0; i < Dimension; i++)
00246       for (j = 0; j < Dimension; j++)
00247         theVector(i) += B(i,j) * help(j) / sqrt(double(p.size()));
00248 
00249     for (i = 0; i < Dimension; i++) {
00250       sDelta(i) = (1 - c) * sDelta(i) + cu * theVector(i);
00251       normS += sqr(sDelta(i));
00252     }
00253     normS  = sqrt( normS );
00254 
00255     // Eq. (5)
00256     delta *= exp(D * ( normS - chi_n ) / chi_n );
00257 
00258     //
00259     // eigenvalues lambda and eigenvector matrix B
00260     //
00261     eigensymm(C, B, lambda);
00262 
00263     //
00264     // lower bound
00265     //
00266     if ((delta * sqrt(fabs(lambda(Dimension - 1)))) < lowerBound) {
00267       delta = lowerBound / sqrt(fabs(lambda(Dimension - 1)));
00268     }
00269   }
00270 
00271   void updateStrategyParameters97(ChromosomeT<double> &x, Population &p) {
00272     double normS;
00273     ChromosomeT<double> xPrime(Dimension);
00274     center(xPrime, p);
00275 
00276     // Eq. (2)
00277     for (i = 0; i < Dimension; i++)
00278       s(i) = (1 - c) * s(i) + cu * sqrt(double(p.size())) / delta *
00279         (xPrime[i] - x[i]);
00280 
00281     // Eq. (3)
00282     for (i = 0; i < Dimension; i++)
00283       for (j = 0; j < Dimension; j++)
00284         C(i, j ) = ( 1 - ccov ) * C(i, j) + ccov * s(i) * s(j);
00285 
00286     // Eq. (4)
00287     normS      = 0;
00288     theMatrix = 0;
00289     theVector = 0;
00290 
00291     for (i = 0; i < Dimension; i++)
00292       for (j = 0; j < Dimension; j++)
00293         for (k = 0; k < Dimension; k++)
00294           theMatrix(i,j) += B(i,k) * B(j,k) / sqrt(fabs(lambda(k)));
00295     for (i = 0; i < Dimension; i++)
00296       for (j = 0; j < Dimension; j++)
00297         theVector(i) += theMatrix(i, j) * (xPrime[j] - x[j]);
00298 
00299     for (i = 0; i < Dimension; i++) {
00300       sDelta(i) = (1 - c) * sDelta(i) + cu * theVector(i) *
00301 sqrt(double(p.size())) / delta;
00302       normS += sqr(sDelta(i));
00303     }
00304     normS  = sqrt( normS );
00305 
00306     // Eq. (5)
00307     delta *= exp(D * ( normS - chi_n ) / chi_n );
00308 
00309     //
00310     // eigenvalues lambda and eigenvector matrix B
00311     //
00312     eigensymm(C, B, lambda);
00313   }

00315   double getDelta()                 { return delta; }
00316   void   setDelta(double x)         { delta = x; }
00317   void   cutDelta(double x = 1E-10) { if(delta < x) delta = x; }
00318   double getChi_n()                 { return chi_n; }

00320   double getCondition()             { return lambda(0) / lambda(Dimension -
00321 1); }

00323   const  Array<double> &getLambda() { return lambda; }
